subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Carlos Sastre of Spain, the defending champion, and Denis Menchov of Russia, the winner of the Giro d’Italia, are among the leading contenders in the Tour de France.
snippet: Carlos Sastre of Spain, the defending champion, and Denis Menchov of Russia, the winner of the Giro d’Italia, are among the leading contenders in the Tour de France.
